text: When 'scope' is passed to `OAuth2Token.__init__()` but it is None, a NoneType exception will be raised, so I updated the check to make sure scope is not None.
title: Fix for oauth2 token processing

text: When 'scope' is passed to `OAuth2Token.__init__()` but it is None, a NoneType exception will be raised, so I updated the check to make sure scope is not None.
title: Fix for oauth2 token processing
Pull request merge from arnicvs/oauthlib:niels/patch-token-scope-processing to idan/oauthlib:master

text: Fixed OAuth2Token() breaking when scope is passed in params but has value None.
